channel.title: Using a LFI to get a RCE in webhacking
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
It is my first post here so tell me if I do something wrong.
During a CTF with a LFI vulnerability. I found [this article](https://dustri.org/b/from-lfi-to-rce-in-php.html) talking about getting a RCE from a LFI using the temporary file of php.
So I think It is a good idea to share this article here.
